motivated_description: I am motivated to continuously learn new technologies and develop myself. My ability to solve complex problems and my passion for programming make me a valuable member of your team.
task_manager_description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
still_not_sure: Still not sure if I am the right person for your project? Contact me so I can reassure you. Let us work together.
privacy_policy_agree: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
